short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds helping functions to marktplaats site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a set of features added to Marktplaats to make it better performing and improve user experience.
Version 2.0 Automatically maximizes pictures below the advertisement so you don't need to click on them to view them
